mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product (pName, pPrice, pSize, pColor, pInformation, pImage, pAmount, pMainCategory, pSubCategory, pImageURL, pCode, pDelivery) values (#{pName}, #{pPrice}, #{pSize}, #{pColor}, #{pInformation}, #{pImage}, #{pAmount}, #{pMainCategory}, #{pSubCategory}, #{pImageURL}, #{pCode}, #{pDelivery})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_product order by pno desc limit 1;
